mapper.select: select * from grade order by no asc
mapper.insert: insert into grade(sname, pid, kor, math, eng, social, science, exam, tname, tid) values (#{sname}, #{pid}, #{kor}, #{math}, #{eng}, #{social}, #{science}, #{exam}, #{tname},#{tid})
mapper.update: update grade set exam=#{exam}, kor=#{kor}, math=#{math}, eng=#{eng}, social=#{social}, science=#{science} where no=#{no}
mapper.select: select sum(kor, math, eng, social, science) from grade where sname=#{sname}
select avg(kor, math, eng, social, science) from grade where sname=#{sname}
